Constructor Detail

Method Detail

createDatabase

public Database createDatabase(String type,
                               String databaseName,
                               String username,
                               String password)
Create and return a database object corresponding to type and initialise it with the database name, user name and password. If the type is not supported then null will be returned.

Parameters:
type - The database type.
databaseName - The database name.
username - The user name used to connect to the database.
password - The password used to connect to the database.
Returns:
The database object or null if the database type is not supported.
